page.title: 13PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: Public houses are very important places around here where people can meet their friends,have a drink, and a snack and play games.The Swan is 500 years old,with 100-150 customers a week.They sell snacks,lunches, and evening meals as well as drinks.The Green Man is 600 years old.The landlady is Mrs.Leader.Several years ago it was burned down but now has been restored.The Three Horseshoes is the smallest pub in our area.It has only 15-20 customers a day.It has a football team,darts team,and a pool team.The Rising Sun is built from some frame timbers from Tilty Abbey and serves lunches and evening meals.It serves 150-200 people a week.The Rising Sun is the only pub that has had any violence but not any more.
